title: If this is a teaser for the next Pentakill album...
body:
[http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/LOL_CMS_09_Article_04.jpg](http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/LOL_CMS_09_Article_04.jpg)
...consider me interested

(The icon with the peculiar Mordekaiser-helmet-shape)

replies.body: hmmm, then i have no idea, hopefully new pentakill or even hexakill, add a member to the band, skins update? i know morde needs it, shows him with flaming shoulder pauldrons and needs to actually play a bit of the guitar for his dance like yorick pentakill does, not just air guitar on his axe/mace.
sadly no, its an old pentakill player icon, it's just zoomed in that little circle window. but hey we can dream!!!

Is that so? I can't find it in the Summoner Icon section of Lolwiki and it is definitely not the regular Pentakill icon.
[http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c4/ProfileIcon666_Pentakill.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/64?cb=20160701195432&format=webp](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c4/ProfileIcon666_Pentakill.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/64?cb=20160701195432&format=webp)
